timeline.message:
Validate usernames do not match banned usernames or bad words

This update:
- adds name validation to login, (it was already present
  for account creation). Name validation asserts that
  a given name does not contain a bad word.
- adds banned username check to name validation. This check
  verifies that a given name does not match a banned username.

Split username is already taken check from login

If we check if a username is already taken when doing
a registered login, we will see the name is always taken!
This update removes the username is already taken check
from username validation and moves the check to anonymous
login and user registration.

timeline.author: RoiEXLab

replies.bodyText: Looks like no, not sure how long the suppression was out of date for, looks like perhaps for some time.

timeline.message: Delete unused class and remove out of date warning suppression
